sub_title: Project Manager System Delivery Management - Business Line DUV @ ASML
summary:
Highly motivated and ambitious supply chain project management professional. Experience gained in managing customer specific supply chain implementation projects at a wide variety of companies, as well as representing global supply chain management departments in cross-sector product teams during new product introductions (NPI) in the semiconductor industry. 

Able to develop strong internal and external relationships and work effectively in a fast-paced multi-disciplinary team environment. Delivering high quality results within challenging time frames. Analytical, solution driven, strong communicator, no-nonsense and result-oriented.

profile_positions.description:
- Lead cross-sectoral projects to realize Business Line DUV Priorities 
- End-to-end responsible to deliver Cost/Quality/Delivery improvements for Business Line DUV
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - System Delivery Management - Business Line DUV

profile_positions.description:
- Manage supply chain introduction of new products
- Plan & mobilize resources of the supply chain management project team
- Define, defend and manage supply chain requirements & deliverables
- Manage material availability balanced against customer service levels, inventory, quality, costs and risks: Identify bottle necks, prepare decisions and take actions towards engineering, suppliers, factories, field to manage the critical path both for time-to-market and ramp
- Represent all Global Supply Chain departments in the cross-sector Product Team
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
- Manage supply chain introduction of new products
- Plan & mobilize resources of the supply chain management project team
- Define, defend and manage supply chain requirements & deliverables
- Manage material availability balanced against customer service levels, inventory, quality, costs and risks: Identify bottle necks, prepare decisions and take actions towards engineering, suppliers, factories, field to manage the critical path both for time-to-market and ramp
- Represent all Global Supply Chain departments in the cross-sector Product Team
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Leader Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
- Create and drive an Operational Logistics Product Plan to ensure planning and product (design) maturity and to guide a dedicated group of project coordinators towards volume planning excellence
- Plan and report on the timely definition and completeness of BOM and timely release of design documentation
- Understand the integration plan of proto and pilot systems and their different configurations
- Translate the various demand components into an Integral Demand Plan and determine the logistic consequences of proposed plan changes
- Drive for material availability, report (material) critical path, define/drive actions to improve and escalate
- Manage projected logistic expenditures of supply chain (value curve), inventories, (returnable) tools and packaging
- Encourage the timely transfer of planning responsibility to volume logistics (drive for planning maturity) for parts, production modules and system
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Product Lifecycle Management

profile_positions.description:
MAG45 is one of the leading industrial integrators in Europe. As an industrial integrator, MAG45 manages the supply chain, including procurement activities, for MRO (Maintenance, Repair & Operation) and BOM (Bill of Material) products on behalf of the customer. As one of the pioneers in integrated supply, MAG45 has built a successful and international track record among well-known multinationals in the medical, high tech, pharmaceutical, FMCG and electronics industries. 

As project manager, I am responsible for the co-development and project implementation of our supply chain solutions at national and international clients.

Pre-contractual phase:
- analysis of purchasing and goods flow processes at the client
- development of customer specific supply chain solutions
- present implementation proposal to the client

Contractual phase:
- on-time implementation of the supply chain solutions within the proposed budget
- managing planning and updating internal and external stakeholders
- proactive reporting on progress within project (internal and external)
- identify and solve problems and timely escalation
- create consensus within the project team
- correct and timely information sharing
- motivation of project team members regarding development and implementation of the project plan
profile_positions.title: Project Manager SCM Solutions Engineering

profile_positions.description:
- Monitoring and controlling the progress of the Project Plan Logistics to secure a swift time-to-market
- Representing the supply chain in cross-sector project teams
- Determining the logistic consequences of engineering changes and proposed market plan changes and related actions on project and program level
- Planning and reporting on the timely availability of Technical Product Documentation (TPD), completeness of Bill of Material and status of industrialization of supply chain
- Planning, coordinating and managing the material flow for critical, non-volume materials (parts, prototypes, spares, tools and packaging) in co-operation with Procurement, Material Planning, Service logistics and suppliers
- Driving critical material escalations and reporting on status
- Creating a stable, regular environment for all materials in order to transfer materials to Material Planning (buys), Production Planning (makes) and Service Logistics (spares and tools)
- Driving commissioning of logistics processes against minimum cost (both capital as operational expenditures)
- Securing availability and monitoring proper execution of accurate implementation plans for engineering changes and challenging the project teams on timing and supply chain impact
- Developing new processes and further automation of these processes to improve efficiency and job clarity
- Contributing to further development of the New Product Logistics department as part of the Global Logistics department by taking part in improvement projects
- Collaborating with the Logistics & Engineering department of the ASML production site in Linkou - Taipei, Taiwan
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator New Product Logistics

profile_positions.description:
- Leading a group of 10-25 persons
- Planning and employability
- Development of people within the team
- Optimization of operational processes
profile_positions.title: Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
- Researching various aspects of Supply Chain Flexibility
- Collecting data and analyzing data to existing theories
- Proposing points of improvement regarding Supply Chain Flexibility and optimizing operational processes to support customer serviceability
- Writing implementation plan
profile_positions.title: Graduate
